Uses of Package
ca.corefacility.gview.layout.plot

Packages that use ca.corefacility.gview.layout.plot
ca.corefacility.gview.layout.plot Provides necessary code to draw out different types of plots on a GView map. 
ca.corefacility.gview.style.datastyle Provides for storage/manipulation of style information specific to the particular data we are displaying (such as the specific sequence/features).
